item.title: Where can I buy bitcoin in Philippines?
item.description:

4.3 GB is just another Monday morning for Hubble. Hubble transmits 120 GB of data every week. That data is sent from Hubble's S-band antenna (~2.4 GHz) to a TDRS (Tracking and Data Relay Satellite), which relays it to a dish in White Sands, New Mexico.

item.title: How is paytm different from bitcoin?
item.description:
How is paytm different from bitcoin?

Answer: PayTM is an electronic wallet where you can load money from bank and use it for recharges or other services. Bitcoin is a cyrptocurrency. You need a wallet to keep your bitcoins, yes, Bitcoins is a currency while Paytm is a wallet. You can't keep bitcoins in PayTM if that's what you are...

item.title: What is the most innovative blockchain?
item.description:
What is the most innovative blockchain?

Answer: Ethereum. Why ? Because it has been designed to accept any kind of smart contracts (The Ethereum protocol can execute any code that you write in a contract). I hope it will change the world soon, but I am not sure if it will take the form of Ethereum or any another similar platform.

item.title: Rejecting Today's Hard Fork, the Ethereum Classic Project Continues on the Original Chain: Here's Why
item.description:
Rejecting Today's Hard Fork, the Ethereum Classic Project Continues on the Original Chain: Here's Why

Ethereum hard forked today. As per what seemed to be the popular demand, the protocol rules have been updated incompatibly with the existing Ethereum protocol. Users have essentially moved to a new blockchain and left the old one behind. At time of publication, well over 90 percent of hash power on the Ethereum network had moved to the new chain.

item.description:

item.title: Petition Pushes CFTC to Clarify Rules on Blockchain 'Delivery' - CoinDesk
item.description:
Petition Pushes CFTC to Clarify Rules on Blockchain 'Delivery' - CoinDesk

US law firm Steptoe & Johnson LLP has filed a petition with the Commodity Futures Trading Commission (CFTC), calling on the agency to provide more clarity regarding the definition of "delivery" in blockchain-based transactions. Signed by Steptoe partner Micah Green and senior policy advisor (and former CFTC commissioner) Michael Dunn, the petition centers around actions the agency took against Hong Kong-based bitcoin exchange Bitfinex in June.

item.title: IBM Launches Blockchain Cloud Services on High Security Server, LinuxONE
item.description:
IBM Launches Blockchain Cloud Services on High Security Server, LinuxONE

IBM has announced a cloud service for organizations requiring a secure environment for blockchain networks. According to the company, the service, which allows clients to test and run blockchain projects that handle private data securely, is ideal for organizations in regulated industries that need strong compliance measures.

item.title: Now it's Bitcoin's turn. Eth's hard fork was a success. It didn't even take hours to sort out (let alone days). It took about 1 minute. This goes to show that hard forks can be much safer than some FUD pushers will have you think. * /r/btc
item.description:
Now it's Bitcoin's turn. Eth's hard fork was a success. It didn't even take hours to sort out (let alone days). It took about 1 minute. This goes to show that hard forks can be much safer than some FUD pushers will have you think. * /r/btc
